vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Planned Development District for R-5(A) Single Family District uses and a public school other than an open-enrollment charter school on property zoned an R-5(A) Single Family Subdistrict within Planned Development District No. 595, the South Dallas/Fair Park Special Purpose District, with an H/62 Historic Overlay for James Madison High School, on the south corner of Martin Luther King Jr. Boulevard and Meadow Street
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, subject to a development plan, traffic management plan and conditions with retention of H/62 Historic Overlay
Z190-263(CT)

Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, subject to a development plan, traffic management plan and conditions with retention of H/62 Historic Overlay
